questions.text: Which onePOS feature allows you to duplicate the configuration of an existing printer routing setup to a new one?
questions.explanation: The 'Add Like' feature copies settings from an existing configuration to speed up setup.

questions.text: In onePOS, a KDS can display orders from multiple terminals if routing is set up correctly.
questions.explanation: Proper routing allows a KDS to receive orders from any linked terminal.

questions.text: What happens if you assign the wrong sales category to a menu item in onePOS?
options: Reports may show inaccurate category totals
The item will be hidden from all menus
The system will not allow you to save it
questions.answer: Reports may show inaccurate category totals
questions.explanation: Misassigned sales categories don't block the item but cause incorrect reporting data.

questions.text: Price groups in onePOS can override the base price of items during certain time frames.
questions.explanation: They are designed for scheduled pricing changes, such as happy hours or promotions.

questions.text: Which onePOS hardware component typically connects via a serial COM port?
questions.explanation: Serial COM ports are most often used for thermal receipt printers like the SNBC S80.

questions.text: The Management Console in onePOS allows you to edit existing menu item prices without needing to restart the POS terminals.
questions.explanation: Price changes take effect immediately and do not require a restart.

questions.text: If a gift card is reported lost, what is the correct procedure in onePOS?
options: Deactivate the card in the Gift Card Dashboard
Delete the card from the menu
Change the card's price group to 'Inactive'
Remove the card from sales categories
questions.answer: Deactivate the card in the Gift Card Dashboard
questions.explanation: The dashboard is used to deactivate lost or stolen cards to prevent further use.

questions.text: Dual pricing in onePOS can only be applied to food items, not alcohol.
questions.explanation: Dual pricing can be applied to any item, including alcohol, as long as it's configured correctly.

questions.text: Which setting determines how orders are sorted on a Kitchen Display System screen?
questions.explanation: Screen groups define how and where orders appear on KDS screens.

questions.text: In onePOS, COM port mismatches between hardware and Management Console settings can cause printing failures.
questions.explanation: Both the COM port and baud rate must match for proper printer communication.

questions.text: Which onePOS feature is best for offering a fixed-price meal with multiple courses?
questions.explanation: Combo Builder allows you to bundle items together for a set price.

questions.text: A terminal in onePOS can be assigned to multiple printer routes.
questions.explanation: Multiple routes can be assigned to ensure items print at different stations as needed.

questions.text: Which report would you use to check daily sales totals by category in onePOS?
questions.explanation: This report organizes daily sales totals by the sales category assigned to items.

questions.text: In onePOS, deleting an employee automatically removes their past timecard data.
questions.explanation: Timecard history remains stored for record-keeping even if the employee is removed.

questions.text: Which feature should be used to automatically apply a discount during a specific date range?
questions.explanation: Price Groups can be scheduled to apply alternate pricing or discounts for set periods.

questions.text: Changing an itemâ€™s sales category in onePOS will retroactively update all past reports for that item.
questions.explanation: Reports reflect the sales category at the time of sale, not the current setting.

questions.text: What is the correct baud rate setting for an SNBC S80 printer when configured in onePOS?
questions.explanation: The SNBC S80 uses a baud rate of 115200 for optimal performance.

questions.text: The 'Gift Card Dashboard' can display the remaining balance and transaction history for a card.
questions.explanation: The dashboard shows both balance and history for operator reference.

questions.text: If a KDS screen is not showing orders, which is NOT a likely cause?
questions.explanation: A KDS is digital; printer paper jams do not affect order display.

questions.text: The 'Add Like' feature can be used when creating both employees and printer routings in onePOS.
questions.explanation: It works in multiple areas to duplicate configurations quickly.
